Sentencas: In fabrication processes of solid oxide fuel cells, high-temperature heat treatments cannot be avoided.
Titulo: REACTION BETWEEN SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL MATERIALS

Sentencas: It will give rise to mutual reaction and interdiffusion of the cell component materials: yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ, electrolyte), (La, Sr)MnO3 (cathode), Ni-YSZ cermet (anode) and (La, Ca)CrO3 (separator).
Titulo: REACTION BETWEEN SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL MATERIALS

Sentencas: Reactivity of LaMnO3 and YSZ was estimated by thermodynamic calculations, and it was found that the nonstoichiometry at La site in LaMnO3 plays an important role on the reaction.
Titulo: REACTION BETWEEN SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL MATERIALS

Sentencas: Diffusion of Mn into YSZ leads to increase of La activity at the interface and promotes the reaction.
Titulo: REACTION BETWEEN SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL MATERIALS

Sentencas: Electrical conductivity of YSZ decreases when Mn dissolves in the cubic phase of YSZ.
Titulo: REACTION BETWEEN SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL MATERIALS

Sentencas: Oxidation state of the dissolving Mn varies with partial pressure of oxygen and affects the electrical properties of YSZ.
Titulo: REACTION BETWEEN SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL MATERIALS

Sentencas: Migration of Ca from (La, Ca)CrO3 separator to other cell components is one of the largest problems in the co-firing cell fabrication process because it prohibits the sintering of the separator.
Titulo: REACTION BETWEEN SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL MATERIALS
